mapper.sql: id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, order_id, shipper_id, transporter_id, dispense_status, driver_id, status, costs, order_no, car_id, transporter_company_id, shipper_company_id, take_attachment_id_1, take_attachment_id_2, take_attachment_id_3, take_attachment_id_4, take_date, deliver_attachment_id_1, deliver_attachment_id_2, deliver_attachment_id_3, deliver_attachment_id_4, deliver_date, confirm_date
mapper.select:
select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.order_No as orderNo, a.costs, a.status, a.dispense_status as dispenseStatus,a.dispense_date as dispenseDate, a.take_date as takeDate,a.deliver_date as deliverDate,a.confirm_date as confirmDate, b.name as shipperCompanyName, c.name as shipperName, d.name as transporterCompanyName, e.name as transporterName, f.surname as driverSurname,f.name as driverName,f.mobile as driverMobile, g.name as carName,g.code as carCode from t_waybill a
left join t_company b on a.shipper_company_id = b.id left join t_user c on a.shipper_id = c.id left join t_company d on a.transporter_company_id = d.id left join t_user e on a.transporter_id = e.id left join t_user f on a.driver_id = f.id left join t_car g on a.car_id = g.id where 1=1
and a.status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and a.dispense_status = #{dispenseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}
and a.order_no like concat('%',#{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.name like concat('%',#{sCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and c.mobile like concat('%',#{sMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and d.name like concat('%',#{tCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and e.mobile like concat('%',#{sMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and f.mobile like concat('%',#{dMobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')

select a.id, a.create_date as createDate, a.update_date as updateDate, a.order_no as orderNo,a.costs, a.status as status, a.dispense_status as dispenseStatus,a.dispense_date as dispenseDate, a.take_date as takeDate,a.deliver_date as deliverDate,a.confirm_date as confirmDate, b.name as shipperCompanyName, c.surname as shipperSurname, c.name as shipperName, c.mobile as shipperMobile, d.name as transporterCompanyName, e.surname as transporterSurname, e.name as transporterName,e.mobile as transporterMobile, f.surname as driverSurname,f.name as driverName,f.mobile as driverMobile, g.name as carName,g.code as carCode,
j.departure_province_id as departureProvinceId, j.departure_city_id as departureCityId, j.departure_area_id as departureAreaId, j.destination_province_id as destinationProvinceId, j.destination_city_id as destinationCityId, j.destination_area_id as destinationAreaId, j.car_type_id as carTypeId, j.tyre_no as tyreNo, j.handling_type_id as handlingTypeId, j.payment_type_id as paymentTypeId, j.car_length as carLength, j.goods_type goodsType, j.goods_units as goodsUnits, j.deliver_date orderDeliverDate, j.remark, j.insurance_id, j.use_type_id as useTypeId, j.length, j.width, j.height, j.weight
from t_waybill a left join t_company b on a.shipper_company_id = b.id left join t_user c on a.shipper_id = c.id left join t_company d on a.transporter_company_id = d.id left join t_user e on a.transporter_id = e.id left join t_user f on a.driver_id = f.id left join t_car g on a.car_id = g.id
left join t_order j on a.order_id = j.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.take_date as takeDate, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as takeAttachmentId1Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',c.attachment_link) as takeAttachmentId2Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',d.attachment_link) as takeAttachmentId3Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',e.attachment_link) as takeAttachmentId4Link from t_waybill a LEFT JOIN t_attachment b on a.take_attachment_id_1 = b.id LEFT JOIN t_attachment c on a.take_attachment_id_2 = c.id LEFT JOIN t_attachment d on a.take_attachment_id_3 = d.id LEFT JOIN t_attachment e on a.take_attachment_id_4 = e.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.deliver_date as deliverDate, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',b.attachment_link) as deliverAttachmentId1Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',c.attachment_link) as deliverAttachmentId2Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',d.attachment_link) as deliverAttachmentId3Link, concat('${@com.iflytransporter.web.conf.ConstantsConfig@getLinkPath()}',e.attachment_link) as deliverAttachmentId4Link from t_waybill a LEFT JOIN t_attachment b on a.deliver_attachment_id_1 = b.id LEFT JOIN t_attachment c on a.deliver_attachment_id_2 = c.id LEFT JOIN t_attachment d on a.deliver_attachment_id_3 = d.id LEFT JOIN t_attachment e on a.deliver_attachment_id_4 = e.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into t_waybill (id, create_date, update_date, data_status, desp, order_id, shipper_id, transporter_id, dispense_status, driver_id, status, costs, order_no, car_id, transporter_company_id, shipper_company_id, take_attachment_id_1, take_attachment_id_2, take_attachment_id_3, take_attachment_id_4, take_date, deliver_attachment_id_1, deliver_attachment_id_2, deliver_attachment_id_3, deliver_attachment_id_4, deliver_date, confirm_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dispenseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeAttachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeAttachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeAttachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeAttachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{takeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliverAttachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverAttachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverAttachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverAttachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update t_waybill
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipper_id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dispense_status = #{dispenseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
costs = #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transporter_company_id = #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shipper_company_id = #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_attachment_id_1 = #{takeAttachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_attachment_id_2 = #{takeAttachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_attachment_id_3 = #{takeAttachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_attachment_id_4 = #{takeAttachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
take_date = #{takeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deliver_attachment_id_1 = #{deliverAttachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliver_attachment_id_2 = #{deliverAttachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliver_attachment_id_3 = #{deliverAttachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliver_attachment_id_4 = #{deliverAttachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
deliver_date = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
confirm_date = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_waybill set create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, data_status = #{dataStatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, desp = #{desp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper_id = #{shipperId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_id = #{transporterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dispense_status = #{dispenseStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, driver_id = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, costs = #{costs,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_no = #{orderNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transporter_company_id = #{transporterCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipper_company_id = #{shipperCompanyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_attachment_id_1 = #{takeAttachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_attachment_id_2 = #{takeAttachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_attachment_id_3 = #{takeAttachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_attachment_id_4 = #{takeAttachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, take_date = #{takeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, deliver_attachment_id_1 = #{deliverAttachmentId1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_attachment_id_2 = #{deliverAttachmentId2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_attachment_id_3 = #{deliverAttachmentId3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_attachment_id_4 = #{deliverAttachmentId4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, deliver_date = #{deliverDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, confirm_date = #{confirmDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
